name: Tandem Bank
description: Tandem, UK's fast-growing digital bank, is hiring a Senior Cloud Engineer to improve the operational and cost efficiency of their AWS estate, with benefits including flexible work locations (fully remote or hybrid), a salary of £75-85K, and up to 20% bonus; the job will require strong AWS knowledge, software development experience (C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript), and working knowledge of the Financial Services or Fintech industry.
